channel.title: Mystic Brew

item.title: Mystic Brew #530: RIP Eddie Palmieri, Judy Bailey, Terry Reid & Jesse Sharps
item.description: <p>Mike plays music in memory of the great latin jazz pianist/composer Eddie Palmieri, NZ born Australian jazz legend Judy Bailey, UK folk artist Terry Reid &amp; US saxophonist/composer Jesse Sharps plus new music from Australia &amp; around the world</p>
item.author: Mike Gurrieri

item.title: Mystic Brew #532: Marley Del Prete
item.description: <p>Local trumpeter/composer/label owner Marley Del Prete shares words &amp; music from his new release launching this Sunday afternoon at the Tramway Hotel as well as inspirations &amp; music from his recent collaborator Nat Birchall.</p>
item.author: Mike Gurrieri

item.title: Mystic Brew #535: RIP Hermeto Pascoal
item.description: <p>Mike pays tribute to the late great Brazilian artist Hermeto Pascoal with a chronoligal tribute of his many albums &amp; collaborations from 1958-2024.</p>
item.author: Mike Gurrieri

item.title: Mystic Brew #536: RIP Ron Carroll
item.description: <p>Mike plays music in memory of Ron Carroll (1968-2025) iconic Chicago house music singer / producer &amp; DJ.</p>
item.author: Mike Gurrieri

item.title: Mystic Brew #537: Tribqu Tribe with Zepherin Saint
item.description: <p>Zepherin Saint drops by for the second hour in the leadup to the Tribqu Tribe event this Saturday at the Quadraphonic Club</p>
item.author: Mike Gurrieri

item.title: Mystic Brew #538: Tamil Rogeon
item.description: <p>Tamil Rogeon drops by for a Mystic Brew ahead of his Tamil Rogeon Orchesta show for the Melbourne International Jazz Festival on Saturday October 18 at the Night Cat</p>
item.author: Mike Gurrieri

item.title: Mystic Brew #539: Melbourne International Jazz Festival Preview Part 1
item.author: Mike Gurrieri
